title: preseason 6
body: when does preseason 6 start?`when does these preseason 6 item changes and alot of stuff come live?

replies.body: Potentially as soon as a couple of weeks. As with any patch there's always the risk of bugs delaying that timeline though.

Do ya'll plan for Illaoi to come some time after the first preseason patch, then?

I had assumed she'd come in this one, but considering the scale of this patch as well as the fact that she is evidently not in this first pbe patch (which is when most new champs are placed) she will not be coming with that patch.
